meanings.definition: Capable of being unified or brought together.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces were unifiable, fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The different colors of paint were unifiable to create a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The unifiable ingredients in the recipe danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her unifiable thoughts and emotions merged into a clear decision.
meanings.sent5: The unifiable melodies of the orchestra filled the room with enchanting music.

meanings.definition: Able to be combined or merged into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The two unifiable teams joined forces to win the championship.
meanings.sent2: The unifiable flavors of the dish blended perfectly to create a delicious taste.
meanings.sent3: The unifiable colors of the rainbow mixed together in a magical swirl.
meanings.sent4: Their unifiable strengths combined to overcome any obstacle in their path.
meanings.sent5: The unifiable elements of the story intertwined to create a captivating plot.
